XUsbPs_DeviceConfig Struct Reference

#include <xusbps.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

The XUsbPs_DeviceConfig structure contains the configuration information to configure the USB controller for DEVICE mode. This data structure is used with the XUsbPs_ConfigureDevice() function call.


Public Attributes

u8 NumEndpoints
XUsbPs_EpConfig EpCfg [XUSBPS_MAX_ENDPOINTS]
u32 DMAMemPhys
XUsbPs_Endpoint Ep [XUSBPS_MAX_ENDPOINTS]
u32 PhysAligned

Member Data Documentation

u32 XUsbPs_DeviceConfig::DMAMemPhys
 

Physical base address of DMAable memory allocated for the driver.

XUsbPs_Endpoint XUsbPs_DeviceConfig::Ep[XUSBPS_MAX_ENDPOINTS]
 

List of endpoint metadata structures.

XUsbPs_EpConfig XUsbPs_DeviceConfig::EpCfg[XUSBPS_MAX_ENDPOINTS]
 

List of endpoint configurations.

u8 XUsbPs_DeviceConfig::NumEndpoints
 

Number of Endpoints for the controller. This number depends on the runtime configuration of driver. The driver may configure fewer endpoints than are available in the core.

u32 XUsbPs_DeviceConfig::PhysAligned
 

64 byte aligned base address of the DMA memory block. Will be computed and set by the L0/L1 driver.
